snippet: The city does not codify neighborhood boundaries, but unsung arbiters are using sites like Google Maps and Wikipedia to draw lines between, say, Park Slope and Gowanus in Brooklyn.
abstract: The city does not codify neighborhood boundaries, but unsung arbiters are using sites like Google Maps and Wikipedia to draw lines between, say, Park Slope and Gowanus in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Amateur Mapmakers Redraw Boundaries of New York Neighborhoods
